subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At age 31 in his 11th season, Jerry Stackhouse has never been closer to an N.B.A. championship. He has subverted his ego and embraced his sixth-man role.
snippet: At age 31 in his 11th season, Jerry Stackhouse has never been closer to an N.B.A. championship. He has subverted his ego and embraced his sixth-man role.
